Of course, we still have a lot more work to do to make sure that veterans get the care they deserve, and I'll continue to stay on it.
It's a problem that I've heard from many #Virginia #veterans about, and I'm proud to be a co-sponsor on this bill to help fix it.
Currently eligibility is calculated based on the presence of ANY VA facility within 40 miles, whether it has the required service or not.
S.1463 will change the 40-mile calculation to be based on the nearest VA facility that provides the service being sought by the veteran.
The Senate just unanimously voted to make an important fix to the way the 40-mile rule in the Veterans Choice Program is calculated.
I have been more upset by this process than anything I've been involved in the U.S. Senate. #SaveWallStReform
